attributes.action: Make it mandatory for all UK business and residential addresses to during the hours of darkness to have an illuninated house number or sign.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For the emergency services, it is of vital importance that when responding to any incidents, they are able to respond quickly and effectivly. At present, during the hours of darkness it is almost impossible to get an accurate fix on many addresses, with many houses and businesses not having visible numbers, to the point where you can drive an entire street and not once see a number. We would like to see a standard design of house number (ie LED) which is illuminated during the hours of darkness and which must be seen from the road.
